current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the credit for production of electricity from
			 renewable resources for certain open-loop
			 biomass and trash facilities placed in service before the date of the
			 enactment of this Act.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the following
			 new paragraph:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

quote.#text: the period beginning after December 31, 2013, and ending before January 1, 2016
the 10-year period beginning on the date the facility was originally placed in service

text.#text:
In the case of electricity produced at a qualified facility described in paragraph (3) or (7) of
			 subsection (d) and placed
			 in service before the date of the enactment of this paragraph, a taxpayer
			 may elect to apply subsection
			 (a)(2)(A)(ii) by substituting

No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) to any taxpayer making an election under this
			 paragraph with respect to
			 electricity produced and sold at a facility during any period which, when
			 aggregated with all other periods for which a credit is allowed under this
			 section with respect to electricity produced and sold at such facility, is
			 in excess of 10 years.

header.#text: Special rule for certain qualified facilities

text.#text: The amendment made by this section shall take effect on January 1, 2014.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2856 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the credit for production of electricity from renewable resources for certain open-loop biomass and trash facilities placed in service before the date of the enactment of this Act.
